scenario: The SOC detected suspicious activity related to Dridex malware from an internal host. A PCAP was retrieved for further analysis after the infected user opened a macro-enabled document. Analyze the PCAP and answer the following questions.
questions: What’s the private IP of the infected host? (format: X.X.X.X)
What’s the malware binary that the macro document is trying to retrieve? (Format: file.extension)
From what domain HTTP requests with GET /images/ are coming from? (Format: domain.tld)

The SOC Team found Dridex, a follow-up malware from Ursnif infection, to be the culprit. The customer who sent her the macro file is compromised. What’s the full URL ending in .rar where Ursnif retrieves the follow-up malware from? (Format: http://(domain-or-IP)/file.rar)
What is the Dridex post-infection traffic IP address beginning with 185.? (Format: 185.X.X.X)
